resources.string: "The aim of the game is to reveal all the cells that are not mines, as quickly as possible. If you reveal a mine, you lose the game."

"You can choose the grid configuration you want to play. To do so, open the New game menu after clicking on the + button. The beginner mode is the default configuration. The random choice will automatically generate a grid for you ! The custom choice will let you set your desired configuration. Note that these two last mode result will not appear in the score screen."
"You can start the game by several ways. You can click on a random cell, put a flag (see flag section), or use a joker (see joker section). Any of these action will start the timer."
"If you want to restart the game with the same settings, you can click on the restart button. That action can be done whenever you want, especially after losing the game."

"If you suspect a cell to be a mine, you can mark it by putting a flag. To do so, you have two different ways : - By clicking on the flag button. If the flag button is red, then you're already in the flag mode. - By doing a long press action on a cell. A short vibration will warm you that the action has been done, if you didn't disable vibration in the settings menu."

"You can use jokers to help yourself!\nTo access them, click on the star in the toolbar menu.\nThere are two jokers : - Safe mode : your next will be safe. If you click on a mine, it will put a flg instead of exploding it ! - Burst mode : it's a powerful move that will reveal all the adjacent cells of where you play ! A flag is put if any of these cells was a mine. When you activate a joker, the star will become yellow. If you click ont the flag button, it will cancel the joker and you can reactivate it later. You can use a joker only once, so think twice before using it !"

"You can access your three best scores for each Beginner, Intermediate or Expert mode. You can also check how many games you've finished, and how many of them you won ! Note that we don't show how many game you lost, because we don't want to discourage you :)"
"Playing minesweeper becomes boring ? Play with your favorite song ! To choose a song in your device, open the Music menu after clicking on the + button."
